name: 王謹誠
objective:
負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行計算流體力學模擬研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
The topic of the special project is decided by the students and the advisor. The student will conduct the research topic related to computational fluid dynamics, and write a final report at the end of the semester.
schedule:
每週討論上一週遇到的問題的解決方法、目前的研究進度、下週研究目標的規劃。
The group meeting is held on every week. The intent of the presentations is to speak about the research updates and challenges.
scorePolicy:
會議出席 20%、口頭報告 40%、期末書面報告 40%。
Attendance 20%、Oral presentation 40%、Final report 40%.
materials:
自編教材
Use of self-made materials
